title: cmd/godoc: examples are too hard to find
body:
It should be much more prominent on the godoc page for a package that there are code
examples available. For instance, the example in text/template is hidden behind a
triangle marked with a tiny "Example" word 3/4 of the way down the page. The
existence of this example should be clear right at the top of the page, perhaps linked
in a separate section adjacent to the overview.
